snippet.title: Chase Me! - Atari game for NOMAM BASIC 10Liners Contest 2024
snippet.description:
(c) 2023 by Víctor Parada

Collect as many coins as you can while being chased by some evil guardians..

This game was written in FastBasic 4.6 for the BASIC 10-liners Contest at NOMAM's conference. It has only 10 lines of code with up to 256 characters of abbreviated BASIC instructions. No machine language code!

This game is for one player using a joystick controller.

More info and download at https://www.vitoco.cl/atari/10liner/CHASEME/

Have fun!
